title: kaNavan enrennai
sahitya:
kaNavan enrennai nIr kai piDittAlE pOdum kAdalait-tarugirEn sAmi nAn kalakkamillAda shivakAmi


anupallavi

  aNimaNi vENDlEn anbirundAlE pOdum aghattukkAri un sahattup-paNi purivEn


caraNam 1    poliyalankAra vElaiyilE summA pozhudinaip-pOkkiDa mATTEn
puttakattai igazhndu pirand-aghattaip-pugazhndu pOrukku nAkkinait-tITTEn
    caraNam 2    vELai tavarAmal upacAram sheidanbu mAlaigaLai nidam shUTTuvEn
kAlaiyum kadirum pOl vElaiyum tiraiyum pOl kalandu nI nirandenuL irundiDum sukham perak-
